sentences.translation: 谁是最可靠的报刊经售人？

sentences.sentence: When you buy a newspaper, take the time to have a friendly chat with the newsagent.
sentences.translation: 在你买报纸的时候，花点时间和报刊经销商友好地聊聊天。

sentences.sentence: From today onwards, begin to find out the name of the people who serve you such as your postman and newsagent.
sentences.translation: 从今天起，开始找出为你服务的人的名字，例如你的邮差和报贩。
